title: As Ivern main I have to explain how my abilites works almost every game
body:
and this could be another reason why he has lower pickrate

[here Ivern abilities btw](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y-gsY5oAsL0)

yes I know, Ivern has very low pick rate

but it's very frustrating that almost every game my teammates don't know how Ivern work

I don't remember how many times ganks failed just because they don't know how my Q works

and how many extra buffs wasted just because they didn't know that it exists

I actually thought that it's a low elo problem, after asking high elo Ivern one-trick players they told me that it's like this even at challenger

I lost all of my motivation to rank up, I wanted to reach high rank hoping that people know how my abilities works 

there are also many other champions with problems like these ( Bard's W for example)

I don't know how Riot can fix this and I don't think it's even possible

And the Pyke one, dude....
Last match I played, I got ping spammed and flamed by the Kai'Sa in my team for "kill stealing" with my ultimate and I was like "Do you know what my ult does? It LITERALLY gives both of us the full kill gold!"

Yea, mostly I was just going through champs with weird mechanics that I thought allies may need to be aware of, especially new players not familiar with anything past the basics. But the basic concept of this I think would help out a lot.

I feel like its similar to bard ... im bard and i create a tunnel over to drag to attempt a steal ... what do they do  ... flash over and suddenly have no escape or seed over and force to flash out .... RIP flash and RIP wasted tunnel ...

Step on shrines with full hp for no reason. Great... im down MP for no gains.  Instantly run to shrines with out letting them grow. Great, you get half the healing for the MP i just spent. Ignore shrines when you have max down and all are grown. Great... your not fixing your missing hp, im not playing raka or sona you have to actually interact with my heal but you don't so now im stuck waiting to get another shrine to start growth.

Plus, Tunnel misuse like MRD said. I tend use them in base to lane whenever i recall or respawn for enhanced MS but teamamtes walk by some of the long range Tunnels that only will give them more MS to return.

Rage if your oom and leave lane to collect a chime for %MP, "OMG 1v2 I hate bards!" Bruhh if im oom then odds are i am very much participating in lane or i wouldent have drained my entire MP pool. Often times its cuz i have to keep burning W... as much as id like to lay this at the feet of the adc there are entirely games where its my own fault for being aggressive and getting poked/outtraded so i wont make that claim. But even then that's participation.

People casting and whiffing ability's trying to catch some one as your R ends then blaming you. Look If during the cast/travel time and Stasis your whiffing a {{champion:110}}  because you cast it before stasis ended... that's on you. Its already been a few seconds before you attempted this cast... what.. are you lagging bro?  My abilitys already on CD and landed on them befor your even in range to cast. you burned flash and R on them IN stasis and timed it badly. Yes... tell me more about how its my fault your R did not land.

I love Ivern!
I commend you for being an Ivern main. :D
And honestly... I wish more people helped guard for invades or warded or protected their JG and understood how to deal with enemy JGs as well.
I main mid and a large part of my job is focused on putting my JG ahead and keeping them safe. Sadly, with random lower elo JGs they do not know about giving over blue so I cannot have the mana to help them in those games... and they never pay attention to lane priority. -_-
However! An Ivern gives double buffs. :D
And is wonderful if I am playing say... Malzahar, so I can instantly go in on them and ulti-them after they are rooted. :D

This was me as Zilean before his mini rework. 

while its common knowledge now, there was once a time when NOBODY knew how Zil's ult worked. 

I had games where I ulted people, they run away, wasting my ult, and when I ask why they said stuff like "Who the fuck knows how zilean works man"

Tho now that people DO know how he works, enemies bait my ult now, so I ult a teammate mid fight and the enemies won't attack him so he doesn't get the revive. 

So either way whether people know how Zil's ult works or they don't, I'm fucked either way. :/

Same with morde, people dont know that my w heals them. But, it is funny when the enemy dies cause they didn't know my ult was dot. Once i killed a tryndamere with the dot; he didn't think to use ult or rage heal cause he didn't even notice he was dying lol.

Yeah, back when Skarner had an extremely low pick rate I refused to play him cuz trying to explain his spires *every single game* got tiring. So, can confirm that that's potentially one reason why Ivern's pickrate is so low XD

I'm happy that he started to be picked up more by alot of people during the jungle exp nerfs so now alot more people know what he does. But yeah, I think they need to make his Q "pull" indicator more sensible to people that don't know what he does.
